ovdesc.p: This is a live file which stores the details of transactions like FT/ACKL reference number which got generated, date, transaction amount, credit account, currency and other datas required for reversing transactions. ID of each record is formed, based on the Unique ID data got from ISO Message.

desc.p: Unique FT/ACKL Id generated for each transaction
This field stores the Company Code where the transaction happens
Stores the transaction Date
Stores the transaction Date
Stores the debited account no
Stores debited customer account number
Stores Credit account number.
Stores the transacted amount.
Stores Debit transaction code
Stores Credit transaction code
Stores the charge type
Stores the charged amount
Stores the charged account
Stores the customer no from whom charges is collected
Stores the credit account to which charge amount is credited
Stores the charged Debit transaction code
Stores the charged Credit transaction code
Stores the Narrative of the Transaction happened
Stores the currency market
Stores whether the transaction is PROCESSED or REVERSED or LOCKED.
Stores YES if Transaction is reversed.
Stores the STMT Entries rose during the transaction and update the STMT entries when raised during the reversal.
Stores the STMT Entries raised during the transaction.
For future use.
Stores whether the Acquirer bin sent in ISO Message
Stores the PAN Number sent in ISO Message
Stores the amount locked during Authorization request.
For future Use
Stores the Unique Auth Code generated for each transaction.
Stores the Retrieval Reference Number sent in ISO Message
Stores whether the Transaction is Acquirer or Issuance.
Stores whether the transaction is happened through ATM or POS
Stores the MTI of each transaction sent in ISO Message
Stores the Processing code of each transaction sent in ISO Message
Stores the Merchant Id of each transaction sent in ISO Message
Stores the Version and its Application used for processing the transaction
Stores the Terminal/POS device Id of each transaction sent in ISO Message
Stores the Merchant/Terminal location of each transaction sent in ISO Message
Stores the Unique FT/ACKL Id generated.
Stores the charges STMT entries raised during the transaction.
